summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dr Ethergreen YKY Hub MVP. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend UI is excellent but has critical configuration issue preventing production deployment.

infrastructure_issues.impact: Production backend not accessible via external URL
infrastructure_issues.details: Kubernetes ingress routing not properly configured for external access

critical_bugs.impact: Frontend cannot communicate with backend - all API calls fail with 404
critical_bugs.details: Should be set to external backend URL or localhost:8001 for development

integration_issues.issue: Registration/login fails due to missing backend URL
integration_issues.details: When REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL is fixed, full integration works perfectly

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Set REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL in frontend/.env to the correct backend URL. Current value is empty, preventing all frontend-backend communication. Also fix Kubernetes ingress routing for external URL access.
